title: Christmas Raffle Registration - JJ Holistic Nutritional Therapy
description: Please fill out all fields to register for our Christmas Raffle Giveaway.

block1.title: Christmas Raffle Registration
block1.p: We are grateful that you are a part of the J&J Holistic Nutritional Therapy Family. In return we would like to invite you to join or raffle via Zoom on the 17th of December at 5pm.

block2.h2: Get a chance to win $500 and more fun surprises!

ul.li: Invite as many family members, relatives, and friends on the day of the event.
The more guests that you can bring in the Zoom event the more chances of bringing home $500.
In order to qualify, guests must be present from start until the end of the Zoom event.
